name: Hilly Cargo Truck 3D
description:
Hilly cargo truck is the best off-road truck parking contest which needs your full attention. You will never see such an amazing and challenging exciting round. Super Truck is made for those who love to play hard driving and tough parking simulation. You act as a driver of a hotel and set the modern luxury 4x4 truck of your guests without damaging the truck. Get ready for most marvelous sporty truck, sit behind the wheels. Make your precision good and land in your unique at right spot. Place your heavy trailer on the right location and increase your parking skills. Expert Truc Simulator is one of the best and wonderful truck parking and driving 3D game. You will love to play this awesome and exciting match.
Test your skills in Crazy Truck Adventure and become professional driver. Display your experience and pull out your talent in the parking world. Fasten your seat belt ride your vehicle fast and place it on its correct destination. Show you’re driving and parking expertise to the world and confirm that you are the best 4x4 truck driver and parker. Operate your truck safely without hitting other vehicles also avoids the collision with other obstacles. Avoid traffic cones and road barriers to avoid damage of your legend truck. Remember, if you hit or crash any cones or barrier then your truck will be damaged or level will be failed. So you can restart your mission again. If you are new to the truck driving and parking contests, do not worry this game is easy to learn. Make your madness useful and increase your experience. This is the chance for you to become the expert 4x4 truck driver and car parker. Learn driving inTruck Adventure Parking Spot and station your vehicle in the parking space.
Truck Simulator is the real truck positioning and truck driving craziness. Incredible 3d snow, desert and hilly mountain environment, realistic and effective sounds, easy and smooth controls and best trailer animations make this game your favorite. There are multiple most amazing and exciting levels for your more fun. There are also 3 environments. Play will become more entertaining with snow sea city environment. You will also enjoy the open environment. All the levels are locked in start except the first one. You will have to clear the first one before moving to the other. There is also a show room of your favorite truck but at start all of your truck are locked. As you make progress you will get other truck too. Game is easy in start and become tough at higher levels.
